## Public Member Functions

### addPassesToEmitMC() {#a662ec545d9a660f19397a43fd5ea07e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::NVPTXTargetMachine::addPassesToEmitMC (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &#42;&amp; Ctx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &amp; Out, bool DisableVerify=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Add passes to the specified pass manager to get machine code emitted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcjit">MCJIT</a>.

addPassesToEmitMC - Add passes to the specified pass manager to get machine code emitted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcjit">MCJIT</a>.

This method returns true if machine code is not supported. It fills the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> Ctx pointer which can be used to build custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer">MCStreamer</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h">NVPTXTargetMachine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

createPassConfig - Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

Targets may override this to extend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig">TargetPassConfig</a>.

### getPredicatedAddrSpace() {#a26f92ba3b56361709577a95d2dd52812}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; const Value &#42;, unsigned &gt; NVPTXTargetMachine::getPredicatedAddrSpace (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
If the specified predicate checks whether a generic pointer falls within a specified address space, return that generic pointer and the address space being queried.

Such predicates could be specified in @llvm.assume intrinsics for the optimizer to assume that the given generic pointer always falls within the address space based on that predicate.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h">NVPTXTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-cpp/#l00277">277</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-cpp">NVPTXTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getTargetTransformInfo() {#a0765a1cb2baae46468bf4ebb2b197638}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Get a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> implementation for the target.

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> returned uses the common code generator to answer queries about the IR.

### isMachineVerifierClean() {#abf3fb694efcf095051f4fa23a8fa7a24}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::NVPTXTargetMachine::isMachineVerifierClean () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns true if the target is expected to pass all machine verifier checks.

This is a stopgap measure to fix targets one by one. We will remove this at some point and always enable the verifier when EXPENSIVE&#95;CHECKS is enabled.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h">NVPTXTargetMachine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### registerDefaultAliasAnalyses() {#a0bcef21a1edd0c1e138ccefafdb93c9c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void NVPTXTargetMachine::registerDefaultAliasAnalyses (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aamanager">AAManager</a> &amp;)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Allow the target to register alias analyses with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aamanager">AAManager</a> for use with the new pass manager.

Only affects the &quot;default&quot; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aamanager">AAManager</a>.
